siteMetadata.bio:
Hi! I'm Clover Fields, 28, from Los Angeles, California. I'm a tattoo artist, a fine artist, and part owner of miss u tattoo.

I have a background in Graphic Design, a deep passion for editing and organizing, and I'm always interested in getting involved in diy projects however I can. Send me a DM or email if you want to work together </3
